alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 3:39PM AKST until December 30 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKST THIS EVENING FOR KODIAK CITY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Accumulation of a light glaze of ice. * WHERE...Kodiak City. * WHEN...Until 7 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of freezing rain and snow will continue across Kodiak City through Saturday evening. An increase in southeasterly wind is expected to push temperatures above freezing and change the precipitation to all rain by 6 pm this evening. Colder air will work back in overnight, changing any lingering precipitation back to snow before ending. A light glaze of ice accumulation is possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
